title: The Scherrer equation versus the 'Debye-Scherrer equation'
Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: Self-assembly finds its own limits
title_cn: 自组装有其自身的局限性

title: Ultrastrong adhesion of graphene membranes
title_cn: 石墨烯膜的超强附着力
abstract: As mechanical structures enter the nanoscale regime, the influence of van der Waals forces increases. Graphene is attractive for nanomechanical systems because its Young's modulus and strength are both intrinsically high, but the mechanical behaviour of graphene is also strongly influenced by the van der Waals force. For example, this force clamps graphene samples to substrates, and also holds together the individual graphene sheets in multilayer samples. Here we use a pressurized blister test to directly measure the adhesion energy of graphene sheets with a silicon oxide substrate. We find an adhesion energy of 0.45 ± 0.02 J m−2 for monolayer graphene and 0.31 ± 0.03 J m−2 for samples containing two to five graphene sheets. These values are larger than the adhesion energies measured in typical micromechanical structures and are comparable to solid–liquid adhesion energies. We attribute this to the extreme flexibility of graphene, which allows it to conform to the topography of even the smoothest substrates, thus making its interaction with the substrate more liquid-like than solid-like.
abstract_cn: 随着机械结构进入纳米尺度状态，范德华力的影响增加。石墨烯对纳米机械系统具有吸引力，因为其杨氏模量和强度本质上都很高，但是石墨烯的机械性能也受到范德华力的强烈影响。例如，该力将石墨烯样品夹紧到基底上，并且还将多层样品中的各个石墨烯片保持在一起。在这里，我们使用加压起泡试验直接测量石墨烯片与氧化硅基底的粘合能。我们发现单层石墨烯的粘附能为0.45＆＃160;＆＃177; 0.02＆＃160; J＆＃160; m <sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>和0.31＆＃160; ＆＃177;＆＃160; 0.03＆＃160; J＆＃160; m <sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>用于包含两到五个石墨烯片的样品。这些值大于在典型的微机械结构中测得的粘附能，并且可与固体和液体的粘附能相媲美。我们将其归因于石墨烯的极高柔韧性，这使石墨烯甚至可以适应最光滑的基材的形貌，从而使其与基材的相互作用更像液体，而不是固体。</ p>

title: Light–induced disassembly of self-assembled vesicle-capped nanotubes observed in real time
title_cn: 实时观察到的光诱导的自组装囊泡覆盖的纳米管的分解
abstract: Molecular self-assembly is the basis for the formation of numerous artificial nanostructures. The self-organization of peptides, amphiphilic molecules composed of fused benzene rings and other functional molecules into nanotubes is of particular interest. However, the design of dynamic, complex self-organized systems that are responsive to external stimuli remains a significant challenge. Here, we report self-assembled, vesicle-capped nanotubes that can be selectively disassembled by irradiation. The walls of the nanotubes are 3-nm-thick bilayers and are made from amphiphilic molecules with two hydrophobic legs that interdigitate when the molecules self-assemble into bilayers. In the presence of phospholipids, a phase separation between the phospholipids and the amphiphilic molecules creates nanotubes, which are end-capped by vesicles that can be chemically altered or removed and reattached without affecting the nanotubes. The presence of a photoswitchable and fluorescent core in the amphiphilic molecules allows fast and highly controlled disassembly of the nanotubes on irradiation, and distinct disassembly processes can be observed in real time using fluorescence microscopy.
abstract_cn: 分子自组装是形成大量人工纳米结构的基础。肽，由稠合苯环组成的两亲分子和其他功能分子自组织成纳米管特别令人感兴趣。然而，对外部刺激做出响应的动态，复杂的自组织系统的设计仍然是一个巨大的挑战。在这里，我们报告自组装，囊泡覆盖的纳米管，可以通过辐射选择性地拆卸。纳米管的壁是3纳米厚的双层，由具有两个疏水分支的两亲性分子制成，当分子自组装成双层时，它们相互交叉。在磷脂的存在下，磷脂与两亲分子之间的相分离产生纳米管，其被囊泡封端，所述囊泡可以被化学改变或去除并重新附着而不影响纳米管。两亲分子中存在光开关和荧光核，可以在辐照下快速且高度受控地分解纳米管，并且可以使用荧光显微镜实时观察到明显的分解过程。

title: A single synthetic small molecule that generates force against a load
title_cn: 单个合成小分子，可产生抵抗载荷的力
abstract: Some biomolecules are able to generate directional forces by rectifying random thermal motions. This allows these molecular machines to perform mechanical tasks such as intracellular cargo transport or muscle contraction in plants and animals. Although some artificial molecular machines have been synthesized and used collectively to perform mechanical tasks, so far there have been no direct measurements of mechanical processes at the single-molecule level. Here we report measurements of the mechanical work performed by a synthetic molecule less than 5 nm long. We show that biased Brownian motion of the sub-molecular components in a hydrogen-bonded [2]rotaxane—a molecular ring threaded onto a molecular axle—can be harnessed to generate significant directional forces. We used the cantilever of an atomic force microscope to apply a mechanical load to the ring during single-molecule pulling–relaxing cycles. The ring was pulled along the axle, away from the thermodynamically favoured binding site, and was then found to travel back to this site against an external load of 30 pN. Using fluctuation theorems, we were able to relate measurements of the work done at the level of individual rotaxane molecules to the free-energy change as previously determined from ensemble measurements. The results show that individual rotaxanes can generate directional forces of similar magnitude to those generated by natural molecular machines.
abstract_cn: 某些生物分子能够通过纠正随机的热运动来产生方向力。这使这些分子机器可以执行机械任务，例如动植物内的细胞内货物运输或肌肉收缩。尽管已合成了一些人工分子机器并共同用于执行机械任务，但到目前为止，还没有直接测量单分子水平的机械过程的信息。在这里，我们报告了对长度小于5纳米的合成分子进行的机械功的测量。我们显示，可以利用氢键键合的[2]轮烷和分子环上的分子环偏置亚分子组分的布朗运动，以产生明显的方向力。我们使用了原子力显微镜的悬臂在单分子松弛循环中对环施加了机械载荷。沿轴拉动环，使其脱离热力学上有利的结合位点，然后发现它承受30 pN的外部载荷返回该位点。使用涨落定理，我们能够将在单个轮烷分子水平上完成的功的测量与先前从整体测量中确定的自由能变化联系起来。结果表明，单独的轮烷能够产生与天然分子机器相似的方向力。

title: Generation of protein lattices by fusing proteins with matching rotational symmetry
title_cn: 通过融合具有匹配旋转对称性的蛋白质来生成蛋白质晶格
abstract: The self-assembly of supramolecular structures that are ordered on the nanometre scale is a key objective in nanotechnology. DNA and peptide nanotechnologies have produced various two- and three-dimensional structures, but protein molecules have been underexploited in this area of research. Here we show that the genetic fusion of subunits from protein assemblies that have matching rotational symmetry generates species that can self-assemble into well-ordered, pre-determined one- and two-dimensional arrays that are stabilized by extensive intermolecular interactions. This new class of supramolecular structure provides a way to manufacture biomaterials with diverse structural and functional properties.
abstract_cn: 以纳米级有序排列的超分子结构的自组装是纳米技术的主要目标。 DNA和肽纳米技术已经产生了各种二维和三维结构，但是在这一研究领域中蛋白质分子的开发还不足。 在这里，我们显示了具有匹配旋转对称性的蛋白质装配体中的亚基的遗传融合，产生了可以自组装成有序的，预定的一维和二维阵列的物种，这些阵列通过广泛的分子间相互作用而得以稳定。 这类新的超分子结构为制造具有多种结构和功能特性的生物材料提供了一种途径。

title: Graphene nanoribbons with smooth edges behave as quantum wires
title_cn: 具有平滑边缘的石墨烯纳米带表现为量子线
abstract: Graphene nanoribbons with perfect edges are predicted to exhibit interesting electronic and spintronic properties, notably quantum-confined bandgaps and magnetic edge states. However, so far, graphene nanoribbons produced by lithography have had rough edges, as well as low-temperature transport characteristics dominated by defects (mainly variable range hopping between localized states in a transport gap near the Dirac point). Here, we report that one- and two-layer nanoribbon quantum dots made by unzipping carbon nanotubes exhibit well-defined quantum transport phenomena, including Coulomb blockade, the Kondo effect, clear excited states up to ∼20 meV, and inelastic co-tunnelling. Together with the signatures of intrinsic quantum-confined bandgaps and high conductivities, our data indicate that the nanoribbons behave as clean quantum wires at low temperatures, and are not dominated by defects.
abstract_cn: 预测具有完美边缘的石墨烯纳米带将表现出有趣的电子和自旋电子性质，尤其是量子限制的带隙和磁性边缘态。 然而，到目前为止，通过光刻法生产的石墨烯纳米带具有粗糙的边缘，以及以缺陷为主的低温传输特性（主要是在狄拉克点附近的传输间隙中的局部状态之间的可变范围跳跃）。 在这里，我们报告说，通过解压缩碳纳米管制成的一层和两层纳米带量子点表现出明确的量子传输现象，包括库仑封锁，近藤效应，高达20meV的清晰激发态以及无弹性的 -tunnelling。 结合固有的量子限制带隙和高电导率的特征，我们的数据表明，纳米带在低温下表现得像干净的量子线，并且不受缺陷的支配。</ p>

title: Solution-processed core–shell nanowires for efficient photovoltaic cells
title_cn: 溶液处理的核壳纳米线，用于高效光伏电池
abstract: Semiconductor nanowires are promising for photovoltaic applications, but, so far, nanowire-based solar cells have had lower efficiencies than planar cells made from the same materials, even allowing for the generally lower light absorption of nanowires. It is not clear, therefore, if the benefits of the nanowire structure, including better charge collection and transport and the possibility of enhanced absorption through light trapping, can outweigh the reductions in performance caused by recombination at the surface of the nanowires and at p–n junctions. Here, we fabricate core–shell nanowire solar cells with open-circuit voltage and fill factor values superior to those reported for equivalent planar cells, and an energy conversion efficiency of ∼5.4%, which is comparable to that of equivalent planar cells despite low light absorption levels. The device is made using a low-temperature solution-based cation exchange reaction that creates a heteroepitaxial junction between a single-crystalline CdS core and single-crystalline Cu2S shell. We integrate multiple cells on single nanowires in both series and parallel configurations for high output voltages and currents, respectively. The ability to produce efficient nanowire-based solar cells with a solution-based process and Earth-abundant elements could significantly reduce fabrication costs relative to existing high-temperature bulk material approaches.
abstract_cn: 半导体纳米线有望用于光伏应用，但到目前为止，基于纳米线的太阳能电池的效率要比由相同材料制成的平面电池低，甚至允许纳米线的光吸收通常更低。因此，尚不清楚纳米线结构的好处（包括更好的电荷收集和传输以及通过光陷阱增强吸收的可能性）是否能弥补纳米线表面和p＆＃处复合引起的性能下降。 8211; n路口。在这里，我们制造的核壳纳米线太阳能电池的开路电压和填充因子值均优于等效平面电池所报告的值，并且能量转换效率为5.4％，与等效平面电池相当平面单元尽管光吸收水平低。该设备使用基于低温溶液的阳离子交换反应制造，该反应在单晶CdS核与单晶Cu <sub> 2 </ sub>壳之间产生异质外延结。我们在单个纳米线上以串联和并联配置集成了多个单元，分别用于高输出电压和电流。与现有的高温散装材料方法相比，具有基于溶液的工艺和富含地球元素的高效纳米线太阳能电池的生产能力可以大大降低制造成本。</ p>

title: Tunable metallic-like conductivity in microbial nanowire networks
title_cn: 微生物纳米线网络中可调谐的类金属电导率
abstract: Electronic nanostructures made from natural amino acids are attractive because of their relatively low cost, facile processing and absence of toxicity. However, most materials derived from natural amino acids are electronically insulating. Here, we report metallic-like conductivity in films of the bacterium Geobacter sulfurreducens and also in pilin nanofilaments (known as microbial nanowires) extracted from these bacteria. These materials have electronic conductivities of ∼5 mS cm−1, which are comparable to those of synthetic metallic nanostructures. They can also conduct over distances on the centimetre scale, which is thousands of times the size of a bacterium. Moreover, the conductivity of the biofilm can be tuned by regulating gene expression, and also by varying the gate voltage in a transistor configuration. The conductivity of the nanofilaments has a temperature dependence similar to that of a disordered metal, and the conductivity could be increased by processing.
abstract_cn: 由天然氨基酸制成的电子纳米结构之所以具有吸引力，是因为它们的成本相对较低，易于加工并且没有毒性。但是，大多数源自天然氨基酸的材料都是电子绝缘的。在这里，我们报道了降低细菌的土壤细菌膜以及从这些细菌中提取的菌毛纳米丝（称为微生物纳米线）的金属样电导率。这些材料的电导率为＆＃8764; 5 mS cm ＆＃8722; 1 ，与合成金属纳米结构的电导率相当。它们还可以在厘米级的距离上进行传导，这是细菌大小的数千倍。此外，可以通过调节基因表达以及通过改变晶体管配置中的栅极电压来调节生物膜的电导率。纳米丝的电导率与无序金属的电导率具有相似的温度依赖性，可以通过加工提高其电导率。

title: Self-assembly of self-limiting monodisperse supraparticles from polydisperse nanoparticles
title_cn: 从多分散纳米颗粒中自动组装自限性单分散超颗粒
abstract: Nanoparticles are known to self-assemble into larger structures through growth processes that typically occur continuously and depend on the uniformity of the individual nanoparticles. Here, we show that inorganic nanoparticles with non-uniform size distributions can spontaneously assemble into uniformly sized supraparticles with core–shell morphologies. This self-limiting growth process is governed by a balance between electrostatic repulsion and van der Waals attraction, which is aided by the broad polydispersity of the nanoparticles. The generic nature of the interactions creates flexibility in the composition, size and shape of the constituent nanoparticles, and leads to a large family of self-assembled structures, including hierarchically organized colloidal crystals.
abstract_cn: 已知纳米颗粒通过通常连续发生并取决于各个纳米颗粒的均匀性的生长过程而自组装成较大的结构。 在这里，我们显示具有不均匀尺寸分布的无机纳米粒子可以自发组装成具有核壳结构的均一尺寸的超粒子。 这种自我限制的生长过程受静电排斥力与范德华力吸引之间的平衡支配，这得益于纳米粒子的广泛多分散性。 相互作用的一般性质在组成纳米颗粒的组成，大小和形状上产生了灵活性，并导致了一大堆自组装结构，包括分层组织的胶体晶体。</ p>

title: Photocurrent mapping of near-field optical antenna resonances
title_cn: 近场光学天线谐振的光电流映射
abstract: An increasing number of photonics applications make use of nanoscale optical antennas that exhibit a strong, resonant interaction with photons of a specific frequency. The resonant properties of such antennas are conventionally characterized by far-field light-scattering techniques. However, many applications require quantitative knowledge of the near-field behaviour, and existing local field measurement techniques provide only relative, rather than absolute, data. Here, we demonstrate a photodetector platform that uses a silicon-on-insulator substrate to spectrally and spatially map the absolute values of enhanced fields near any type of optical antenna by transducing local electric fields into photocurrent. We are able to quantify the resonant optical and materials properties of nanoscale (∼50 nm) and wavelength-scale (∼1 µm) metallic antennas as well as high-refractive-index semiconductor antennas. The data agree well with light-scattering measurements, full-field simulations and intuitive resonator models.
abstract_cn: 越来越多的光子学应用利用纳米级光学天线，这些天线与特定频率的光子表现出强烈的共振相互作用。通常，这种天线的谐振特性通过远场光散射技术来表征。然而，许多应用需要对近场行为的定量了解，并且现有的局部场测量技术仅提供相对的数据，而不是绝对的数据。在这里，我们演示了一个光电探测器平台，该平台使用绝缘体上硅衬底，通过将局部电场转换为光电流，在光谱上和空间上映射任何类型的光学天线附近增强场的绝对值。我们能够量化纳米级（＆＃8764; 50 nm）和波长级（＆＃8764; 1＆＃181; m）金属天线以及高折射率半导体天线的共振光学和材料特性。数据与光散射测量，全场模拟和直观的谐振器模型非常吻合。

title: Ferri-liposomes as an MRI-visible drug-delivery system for targeting tumours and their microenvironment
title_cn: 亚铁脂质体作为MRI可见的靶向肿瘤及其微环境的药物递送系统
abstract: The tumour microenvironment regulates tumour progression and the spread of cancer in the body. Targeting the stromal cells that surround cancer cells could, therefore, improve the effectiveness of existing cancer treatments. Here, we show that magnetic nanoparticle clusters encapsulated inside a liposome can, under the influence of an external magnet, target both the tumour and its microenvironment. We use the outstanding T2 contrast properties (r2 = 573–1,286 s−1 mM−1) of these ferri-liposomes, which are ∼95 nm in diameter, to non-invasively monitor drug delivery in vivo. We also visualize the targeting of the tumour microenvironment by the drug-loaded ferri-liposomes and the uptake of a model probe by cells. Furthermore, we used the ferri-liposomes to deliver a cathepsin protease inhibitor to a mammary tumour and its microenvironment in a mouse, which substantially reduced the size of the tumour compared with systemic delivery of the same drug.
abstract_cn: 肿瘤微环境调节肿瘤的进展和癌症在体内的传播。因此，靶向包围癌细胞的基质细胞可以提高现有癌症治疗的有效性。在这里，我们表明包裹在脂质体内的磁性纳米粒子簇可以在外部磁体的影响下，既靶向肿瘤又靶向其微环境。我们使用了出色的T 2 对比度属性（r 2 ＆＃160; =＆＃160; 573＆＃8211; 1,286＆＃160; s ＆＃8722这些亚铁脂质体中的; 1 ＆＃160; mM ＆＃8722; 1 ）直径为＆＃8764; 95 nm，以无创方式监测体内药物的输送。我们还可视化了载药的铁-脂质体对肿瘤微环境的靶向作用以及细胞对模型探针的摄取。此外，我们使用亚铁脂质体将组织蛋白酶蛋白酶抑制剂递送至小鼠的乳腺肿瘤及其微环境，与相同药物的全身性递送相比，可大大减小肿瘤的大小。
